info.title: Hansard API
info.description: An API that allows querying of Hansard data.

get.summary: Get a list of speaker id’s for a given debate section
get.description: Get a list of speaker id’s for a given debate section by External Id

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: debateSectionExtId
parameters.description: the External ID of the required debate section

get.summary: Get divisions for a given debate section
get.description: Get divisions for a given debate section by External Id

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: debateSectionExtId
parameters.description: the External ID of the required debate section

get.summary: Get all data related to a division
get.description: Get all data (debate title, aye/noe count, house and a record of how members voted) related to a division.  Results can be filtered to show EVEL (English Votes for English Laws) voters only

parameters.name: divisionExtId
parameters.description: the External ID of the required division

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: isEvel
parameters.description: whether or not to return EVEL (English votes for English laws) voters only

get.summary: Get data for a debate section
get.description: Get data (debate title, date, location, house and a record of each member’s contribution) related to a debate section.

parameters.name: debateSectionExtId
parameters.description: the External ID of the required debate section

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

get.summary: Get top level debate id given the id of its child debate section
get.description: Get top level debate id given the id of its child debate section.

parameters.name: debateSectionExtId
parameters.description: the External ID of the required debate section

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

get.summary: Get top level debate given the house, sitting date and section title
get.description: Get top level debate given the house, sitting date and section title

parameters.name: house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: sitting date of the required debate (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: sectionTitle
parameters.description: section title of the required debate

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

get.summary: Get debate contribuitions for a Member

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: the MNIS Id of the Member

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: debateSectionExtId
parameters.description: the External ID of the required debate section

get.summary: Get historic sitting days given house and sitting date range
get.description: Get historic sitting days given house and sitting date range. Results can be filtered on whether or not to include results with sitting sections

parameters.name: queryParams.house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

parameters.name: queryParams.startDate
parameters.description: the date to search from (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: queryParams.endDate
parameters.description: the date to search to (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: queryParams.skip
parameters.description: how many results to skip (Default is 0)

parameters.name: queryParams.take
parameters.description: how many results to return per page (maximum 100)

parameters.name: queryParams.orderBy
parameters.description: how to order results (SittingDateAsc or SittingDateDesc)

parameters.name: queryParams.hasSittingSections
parameters.description: whether or not to only include results with sitting sections

get.summary: Get details of historic sitting day given house and sitting date.
get.description: Get details of historic sitting day for given house and sitting date.

parameters.name: house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

parameters.name: sittingDate
parameters.description:
the sitting date
(yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: flattenStructure
parameters.description: whether or not to flatten the structure of the returned data

get.summary: Get list of speaker ids for given sitting date, house and Hansard section name
get.description: Get list of speaker ids for given sitting date, house and Hansard section name

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Sitting date (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Hansard section name e.g. CWA, QWA, WMS

get.summary: Get status information on which house and sitting date is currently being processed
get.description: Get status information on which house and sitting date is currently being processed

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

get.summary: Get the last sitting date for given house.
get.description: Get the last sitting date for given house.

parameters.name: format

get.description: Gets the year of the earliest sitting date in Hansard

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

get.summary: Get the previous and next sitting days given a house and date.
get.description: Get the previous and next sitting days given a house and date. Returns only the previous sitting day if there is no future day with any Hansard data.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: the date from which to calculate the previous and next sitting dates (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

get.summary: Get all sitting dates given a year, month and house.
get.description: Get all sitting dates given a year, month and house.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: the year for which to return sitting dates (yyyy)

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: the month for which to return sitting dates (mm)

parameters.name: house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

get.summary: Get Hansard name for debate sections given the sitting date and house
get.description: Get Hansard name for debate sections given the sitting date and house. Note that Commons Chamber is returned as 'Debate'.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: date of debate (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

get.description: Get section hierarchy given Hansard section name, sitting date and house.

parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)

parameters.description:
the Hansard section name
(Hansard section names are returned from ‘Sections For Day’ operation)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The sitting date (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

parameters.name: groupByOwner
parameters.description: whether or not to group the results by owner

parameters.description:
the sitting date
(yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: house

parameters.name: sectionExternalId

get.summary: Get a web link for a content item, debate section or division
get.description: Get a web link for a content item, debate section or division given its external id.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: The External Id of a content item, debate section or division

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The required output format (xml or json)

get.summary: Get all results that contain the given search term
get.description:
Get contributions, written statements, written answers, corrections, petitions, committees, divisions and members that contain the given search term.

There are a maximum of four search results of each type.

The search term can be simple text or it can contain directives for advanced searches.
you can also connect multiple search directives with AND
use spokenby:name to get results when named person spoke
use debate:debate to get results for debates matching supplied text
use words:words to get results containing specified words

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: queryParameters.house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

parameters.name: queryParameters.startDate
parameters.description: the date to search from (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: queryParameters.endDate
parameters.description: the date to search to (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: queryParameters.date
parameters.description: the date to search (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: queryParameters.memberId
parameters.description: the unique id of a member (member details are returned from ‘Search Members’ operation)

parameters.name: queryParameters.divisionId
parameters.description: the unique id of the division to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.hansardIdentifier
parameters.description: Hansard identifier

parameters.name: queryParameters.searchTerm
parameters.description: the term for which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.skip
parameters.description: how many results to skip (Default is 0)

parameters.name: queryParameters.take
parameters.description: how many results to return per page

parameters.name: queryParameters.memberIds
parameters.description: the list of member ids in which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.department
parameters.description: department to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.debateType
parameters.description: debate type to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeFormer
parameters.description: whether or not to include former members

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeCurrent
parameters.description: whether or not to include current members

parameters.name: queryParameters.withDivision
parameters.description: whether or not to only include results with a division

parameters.name: queryParameters.seriesNumber
parameters.description: the series number in which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.volumeNumber
parameters.description: the Volume Number in which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.columnNumber
parameters.description: the Column number for which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.committeeTitle
parameters.description: the title of the committee to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.committeeType
parameters.description: committee type to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeCommitteeDivisions
parameters.description: whether or not to include committee divisions

parameters.name: queryParameters.section
parameters.description: unique id of the section to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.outputType
parameters.description: output type (List or Group)

parameters.name: queryParameters.debateSectionId
parameters.description: the unique id of the debate section to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.timelineGroupingSize
parameters.description: timeline grouping size. Enter Day, Month or Year

parameters.name: queryParameters.orderBy
parameters.description: order results (SittingDateAsc or SittingDateDesc)

get.summary: Gets all contributions of required type that contain the specified search term. OutputType can be List or Group.
get.description:
Gets all contributions of required type that contain the specified search term. Results can be filtered by house, memberid, debate, section and sitting date range.

OutputType can be List or Group

How many results to skip and how many to return (used for paging), can also be configured. Note: skip and take parameters can be omitted to return all results.

The search term can be simple text or it can contain directives for advanced searches.
you can also connect multiple search directives with AND
use spokenby:name to find contributions when named person spoke
use debate:debate to find contributions in debates matching supplied text
use words:words to find contributions containing specified words

parameters.name: contributionType
parameters.description: The type of contribution to return (Spoken, Written, Corrections or Petitions)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: queryParameters.house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

parameters.name: queryParameters.startDate
parameters.description: the date to search from (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: queryParameters.endDate
parameters.description: the date to search to (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: queryParameters.date
parameters.description: the date to search (yyyy-mm-dd)

parameters.name: queryParameters.memberId
parameters.description: the unique id of a member (member details are returned from ‘Search Members’ operation)

parameters.name: queryParameters.divisionId
parameters.description: the unique id of the division to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.hansardIdentifier
parameters.description: Hansard identifier

parameters.name: queryParameters.searchTerm
parameters.description: the term for which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.skip
parameters.description: how many results to skip (Default is 0)

parameters.name: queryParameters.take
parameters.description: how many results to return per page

parameters.name: queryParameters.memberIds
parameters.description: the list of member ids in which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.department
parameters.description: department to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.debateType
parameters.description: debate type to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeFormer
parameters.description: whether or not to include former members

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeCurrent
parameters.description: whether or not to include current members

parameters.name: queryParameters.withDivision
parameters.description: whether or not to only include results with a division

parameters.name: queryParameters.seriesNumber
parameters.description: the series number in which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.volumeNumber
parameters.description: the Volume Number in which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.columnNumber
parameters.description: the Column number for which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.committeeTitle
parameters.description: the title of the committee to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.committeeType
parameters.description: committee type to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeCommitteeDivisions
parameters.description: whether or not to include committee divisions

parameters.name: queryParameters.section
parameters.description: unique id of the section to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.outputType
parameters.description: output type (List or Group)

parameters.name: queryParameters.debateSectionId
parameters.description: the unique id of the debate section to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.timelineGroupingSize
parameters.description: timeline grouping size. Enter Day, Month or Year

parameters.name: queryParameters.orderBy
parameters.description: order results (SittingDateAsc or SittingDateDesc)

get.summary: Get all divisions for the given house, sitting date range and title (from search term)
get.description:
Gets all divisions for a given house and sitting date range that contain the specified search term in their title.
Specifying MemberId returns information on how that member voted

Results can be filtered by whether search should IncludeCommitteeDivisions and also WithDivision. Specifying MemberId returns information on how that member voted in MemberVotedAye

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The required output format (xml or json)

parameters.name: queryParameters.house
parameters.description: the parliamentary house (Commons or Lords)

parameters.name: queryParameters.startDate

parameters.description: how many results to skip (Default is 0)

parameters.description: how many results to return per page

parameters.name: queryParameters.memberIds
parameters.description: the list of member ids in which to search

parameters.name: queryParameters.department
parameters.description: department to be searched

parameters.name: queryParameters.debateType
parameters.description: debate type to be searched

parameters.description: whether or not to include former members

parameters.name: queryParameters.includeCurrent
parameters.description: whether or not to include current members

parameters.description: whether or not to only include results with a division

parameters.description: the series number in which to search

get.summary: Gets all petitions that contain the specified search term in their title
get.description:

Results can be filtered by house and sitting date range.
How many results to skip and how many to return (used for paging) can also be configured. Note: skip and take parameters can be omitted to return all results.

get.summary: Gets committees for the given house, sitting date range and title

get.summary: Get counts for given contribution type and sitting date range.
get.description:
Get counts for given contribution type and sitting date range. Counts are by given TimelineGroupingSize (Day, Month or Year), house, contribution type, search term, optional memberid and whether this is a debates search


The search term can be simple text or it can contain directives for advanced searches.
you can also connect multiple search directives with AND
use spokenby:name to count times when named person spoke
use debate:debate to count debates matching supplied text
use words:words to count occurrences of specified words

parameters.description: the required output format (xml or json)
